rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Vastu-compliant entry with a welcoming open space leading to the living area

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious central room designed for family gatherings, with large windows to ensure natural light and cross ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional design in the southeast quadrant, following Vastu guidelines. Adjacent to dining area for convenience.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to kitchen, optimized for family meals and natural lighting with windows on one side.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Located near the entrance for ease of access; designed with ample ventilation and daylight.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Situated in a calm area to provide privacy and good airflow, following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated space on the eastern side as per Vastu guidelines for knowledge and light. Equipped with ample natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom on the north side, optimized for privacy and natural light. Includes a walk-in closet.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace in the northeast corner to harness positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Spacious room on the west side with ample ventilation and natural light

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom positioned for comfort with south facing windows, ensuring good airflow.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Integrated bathroom adjacent to master bedroom following Vastu guidelines with proper water flow directions.
